Description:
BD Origination Manager - KSAGroup is a global reference in low-carbon energy and services.Purpose of the Job•  Identify and develop the company business within KSA.Reporting•  The BD Origination Manager will report to the Head of BD AMEA with a matrix to the Country Manager – KSA.Key Accountabilities:Identify, qualify, and secure prospects as per company strategy.
Developing and maintaining relationships with potential clients and stakeholders.
Analyzing and adjusting strategies in response to competitive activity.
Identifying market needs and recommending appropriate business solutions.
Generating leads and identifying potential business opportunities.
Carry out proactive prospection on potential opportunities.
Provide added value by establishing and organizing contacts with appropriate decision-makers and influencers and securing follow-up meetings if required.
Instruct and coordinate all development activities performed by internal and external resources.
Provide detailed background information on key decision makers and influencers and relationships among them.
Monitor and report on important political events that affect or might affect our current and/or future businesses.
Monitor and report on important personnel moves and change of decision making or decision influencing power inside governmental and public entities. Skills
Skills:
Good understanding of Power Generation, Natural Gas Distribution, electricity, and natural gas commercialization.
Energy regulatory framework
Group’s strategy vision
Group’s governance and ethical rules.
